info.title: Listener
info.description: Golang HTTP service listening for Callback and Timeout URLs

get.description: JSON document containing the API swagger definition

B2CChargesPaidAccountAvailableFunds.description: Available balance of the Charges Paid account under the B2C shortcode used in the transaction.

B2CRecipientIsRegisteredCustomer.description: Key indicating whether customer is registered on M-PESA

B2CUtilityAccountAvailableFunds.description: Available balance of the Utility account under the B2C shortcode used in the transaction.

B2CWorkingAccountAvailableFunds.description: Available balance of the Working account under the B2C shortcode used in the transaction.

ReceiverPartyPublicName.description: This is the name and phone number of the customer who received the payment.

TransactionAmount.description: This is the amount that was transacted.

TransactionCompletedDateTime.description: This is the date and time that the transaction completed M-PESA.

TransactionReceipt.description: This is a unique M-PESA transaction ID for every payment request.

ConversationId.description: Unique identifier for the transaction request.

OriginatorConversationId.description: Unique identifier for the transaction request.

ResultCode.description: Numeric status code indicating the status of the transaction processing

ResultDesc.description: Message from the API that gives the status of the request

ResultType.description: Status code indicating whether transaction was already sent to your listener

TransactionID.description: Unique M-PESA transaction ID for every payment request.

BillRefNumber.description: Account number for which the customer is making the payment

FirstName.description: First Name of the customer making the payment.

LastName.description: Last Name of the customer making payment.

MiddleName.description: Middle Name of the customer making the payment.

OrgAccountBalance.description: Current utility account balance of the payment receiving organization shortcode
